.. :changelog:

Release History
===============

0.30.1 (2017-03-27)
+++++++++++++++++++

* Add NetworkWatcher
* Add PacketCapture
* Add new methods to Virtualk Network Gateway

  * get_bgp_peer_status
  * get_learned_routes
  * get_advertised_routes

0.30.0 (2016-11-01)
+++++++++++++++++++

* Initial preview release. Based on API version 2016-09-01.


0.20.0 (2015-08-31)
+++++++++++++++++++

* Initial preview release. Based on API version 2015-05-01-preview.
